About this site

Introducing WESG, Women in ESG, an innovative startup that empowers women in the workplace by building on the principles of ESG. This platform brings organizations together to spark conversation on gender equality in the workplace. It facilitates dialogue and mutual-assistance between corporations, which allows for the collective advancement toward equality of sexes. We believe that investing in women's career development is the right thing to do and that gender equality is essential for a more peaceful, sustainable, and prosperous future. Join us in our mission to empower women by enrolling in our forum where meaningful conversations happen.
